name: Santa Clause [Feeling jolly]
description:
SANTA 'FEELING JOLLY' [V 0.0]

Author: 3MX DIGITAL GAMES[2015]

PLOT:

The Snow men have teamed up along side the peguine's and stole Santa's Christmas

tree and the decorations......now it's up Santa, equipped with his trusty wack-a-sack

to get all the decorations and tree back....before christmas is ruined for all.

;CONTROLS

[]= keys

()=gamepad

[Left] / [Right] or (<) / (>) = Move

Down = Crouch/Duck

[z] or (X) = Attack up to 3x

[x] or (A) = Jump

[Enter] = Pause/Resume/Select

[Esc] = Exit

QUICK NOTES:

Had to Rush this out before christmas so there maybe a few

bugs and audio issues but should be completely stable.
